sourcesContent:
{{i}}
import {Component} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-skills-box-list', templateUrl: './skills-box-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./skills-box-list.component.css'] }) export class SkillsBoxListComponent { listOfTitles = [ "Bases de données", "Langues", "Dévelopement web", "Outils", "Dévelopement logiciel", ] listOfLogos = [ "database.png", "database.png", ] listOfSkills = [ ["MySql", "Symfony", "PhpMyAdmin"], ["Français", "Anglais", "Allemand"], ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript", "PHP"], ["CLion", "Eclipse", "VegasPro", "AfterEffect", "GitLab", "Photoshop"], ["Java", "C", "C++", "Python", "QT"] ] listOfSkillLogos = [ ["assets/logos/mysql.png", "assets/logos/symfony.jpg", "assets/logos/phpmyadmin.png"], ["assets/logos/french.png", "assets/logos/english.png", "assets/logos/german.png"], ["assets/logos/html.png", "assets/logos/css.png", "assets/logos/js.png", "assets/logos/php.png"], ["assets/logos/clion.png", "assets/logos/eclipse.png", "assets/logos/svp.png", "assets/logos/ae.png", "assets/logos/gitlab.png", "assets/logos/photoshop.png"], ["assets/logos/java.png", "assets/logos/c.png", "assets/logos/c++.png", "assets/logos/python.png", "assets/logos/qt.png"], ] }
